title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 616.4 - Reimbursement from other programs and classifications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 616.4 - Reimbursement from other programs and classifications

State Regulations

Reimbursement for assistance provided to refugees, entrants or other noncitizens of New York by social services districts must be
claimed against those programs which will provide the maximum amount of Federal
reimbursement available, except where the department permits the districts to
claim reimbursement for assistance provided to such individuals against other
programs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
616.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
